column1: Number and Percentage of Children with Medical Exemptions by Grade Type and County, New Jersey, 2019-2020

column2:
Percentages of children meeting all immunization requirements, with provisional admittance, with medical exemptions, with religious exemptions, and out of compliance in the reports may not sum to 100% due
to inconsistencies in reporting that were unable to be resolved because of the COVID-19 pandemic. See Methodology section for more information.
New Jersey Annual Immunization Status Reports, 2019-2020
